metadata.methodology_notes: Self-evaluation pilot using synthetic test cases with known ground truth failure modes. Each case evaluated three times: raw JSON (Baseline A), standard W&B upload without schema (Baseline B), PROACTIVE adapter with structured columns (Treatment).

baseline_a.description: Raw JSON inspection in text editor
notes: case_01: Found all PASS validators, correctly identified clean
case_02: Found all PASS validators, correctly identified clean
case_03: Missed I3/I5 FAIL - scrolled past validator_results
case_04: Spotted I1 FAIL indicating overconfidence
case_05: Found I2/I4 FAIL, recognized phantom work pattern
case_06: Searched for FAIL but missed F2 pattern in trace_chain
case_07: Identified I4 FAIL and incomplete trace
case_08: Overwhelmed by multiple entries, misattributed F4
case_09: Successfully identified mixed pattern from final_decision
case_01: Table view helped scan validator results faster
case_02: Quick scan of final_decision column
case_03: Filtering on FAIL found I3/I5 issues
case_04: Sorted by confidence_score, spotted 0.99 with FAIL
case_05: Filtered empty evidence_sources, found pattern
case_06: Missed F2 - filtering did not surface trace_chain gaps
case_07: Scrolled to trace_chain, spotted null values
case_08: Table view made cross-referencing easier
case_09: Column sorting helped identify mixed types

treatment.description: PROACTIVE W&B Adapter with I1-I6 columns and trace_complete indicator
notes: case_01: I1-I6 all PASS visible immediately, trace_complete=true
case_02: Quick confirmation of all validators passing
case_03: I3/I5 FAIL columns highlighted, F1 identified instantly
case_04: Sorted by confidence, I1 FAIL visible in same row
case_05: I2/I4 FAIL + trace_complete=false flagged F2
case_06: trace_complete=false and I2 FAIL made F2 obvious
case_07: I4 FAIL + trace_complete=false indicated F4
case_08: Filtered I4=FAIL, all F4 cases surfaced immediately
case_09: Multi-column view showed failure diversity at glance

case_03_f1_overconfidence.root_cause: High confidence (0.98) with I3/I5 FAIL - overconfidence

case_04_f1_overconfidence.root_cause: High confidence (0.94-0.99) with I1/I3/I5/I6 FAIL - epistemic overreach

case_05_f2_phantom_work.root_cause: Empty evidence_sources, I2/I4 FAIL - unverified action claims

case_06_f2_phantom_work.root_cause: Claimed completed work without trace evidence

case_07_f4_incomplete_trace.root_cause: Missing CTRL_id/TEST_id in trace_chain, I4 FAIL

case_08_f4_incomplete_trace.root_cause: Incomplete trace chain missing multiple elements
